title: BRIEF-Scientific Games ‍Won New, 5-Year Contract From Lotto Rheinland-Pfalz GmbH​
text: 39 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Scientific Games ‍Won New, 5-Year Contract From Lotto Rheinland-Pfalz GmbH​ Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Scientific Games Corp: * SCIENTIFIC GAMES CORP - ‍WON NEW, 5-YEAR CONTRACT FROM LOTTO RHEINLAND-PFALZ GMBH​ * SCIENTIFIC GAMES -CONTRACT FROM LOTTO RHEINLAND-PFALZ GMBH TO PROVIDE LOTTERY INSTANT GAMES, COOPERATIVE SERVICES PROGRAM FOR INSTANT GAME MANAGEMENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
